short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Netflix Code generator is an extension which will help you find the perfect movie to watch by generating a code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes when you wanna watch a movie and you just can't decide what to watch, But not anymore this extension will help you find the movie you wanna watch just select type of movie you wanna watch select a genre and it will generate a Netflix code by which it will only suggest that type of movies This extension is made by use of HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
